metadata.title: It's Too Bad Things Are Going So Tough

songInfo.album: from Hide Away: The Best of Freddie King (Rhino R2-71510) ,

lyrics.l: It's too bad, things are going so tough with me
Well it's too bad, things are going so tough with me
Well no matter what I do, seem like ev'rything happen to me
I used to have a car, and it was painted white an' black
I used to have a car, and it was painted white an' black

Well I couldn't keep up the payments, and the man, he took it
back

It's too bad, things are going so tough with me
Well no matter what I do
